prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sleek fish with vibrant colors and a friendly smile.
Design a playful aquatic creature with a streamlined body and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small fish Pokemon with a brown body and an orange stripe, perfect for swimming fast.
